module: Module-level comment: This module implements a 2048x32-bit SRAM with byte-enable functionality using four Xilinx Spartan-6 RAMB16BWER primitives. It provides a synchronous read/write interface with byte-level write operations. The module uses four 2048x8-bit SRAM blocks to create the 32-bit wide memory, supports memory initialization via parameters, and handles byte-enable logic for selective byte writing within a 32-bit word.
